definition: to pluck (a string)/to play (a string instrument)/to spring or leap/to shoot (e.g. with a catapult)/(of cotton) to fluff or tease/to flick/to flip/to accuse/to impeach/elastic (of materials)

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)
to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct
to pluck (a string)/to play (a string instrument)/to spring or leap/to shoot (e.g. with a catapult)/(of cotton) to fluff or tease/to flick/to flip/to accuse/to impeach/elastic (of materials)

pinyin: zhou1 ji4 dan4 dao4 dao3 dan4

sentences.english: India has successfully launched a long-range intercontinental ballistic missile able to carry a nuclear warhead, officials say.
sentences.chinese: 印度成功发射一枚可以携带核弹头的洲际弹道导弹。

sentences.english: Xiao Ming is suddenly obsessed with weapons, he is especially interested in anti-ballistic missiles.
sentences.chinese: 小明忽然成了兵器迷，尤其对反弹道导弹很有兴趣。

sentences.english: A generation ago, President Reagan proposed research intoa global shield to defend against ballistic missiles.
sentences.chinese: 一代人之前，里根总统提议研究弹道导弹防御系统。

sentences.english: It is presented an effective approach for computing the basic firing data of missiles.
sentences.chinese: 实现了一种基于摄动制导的弹道导弹的发射诸元算法。

sentences.english: Conventional TBMs were not judged cost-effective for battlefield use.
sentences.chinese: 传统的战术弹道导弹在战场使用上的效率比并不合算。

sentences.english: North Korea has threatened to test-fire an intercontinental ballistic missile.
sentences.chinese: 朝鲜已威胁要试射一枚洲际弹道导弹。

sentences.english: China regrets the abrogation of the Anti-Ballistic Missile Treaty.
sentences.chinese: 反弹道导弹条约》失效感到遗憾。

sentences.english: The submarines equipped with intercontinental ballistic missiles, and anti-ship and anti-submarine torpedoes.
sentences.chinese: 该潜艇装备洲际弹道导弹以及反潜与反舰鱼雷。

sentences.english: The two primary ballistic missile test facilities are at Wuzhai and Shuangchengzi.
sentences.chinese: 两个主要的弹道导弹测试基地分别为五寨和双城子。

sentences.english: The russians first fielded an intercontinental ballistic missile .
sentences.chinese: 俄国人首先发射了洲际弹道导弹。

sentences.english: Some concern has been generated by the Chinese development of an Anti-Ship Ballistic Missile (ASBM) system.
sentences.chinese: 相关关切也因中国反舰弹道导弹系统的开发而生成。

sentences.english: Shoots down own weather satellite to test its ballisticmissile capability.
sentences.chinese: 击落自己的气象卫星以测试弹道导弹能力。

sentences.english: Anti-ballistic missile defenses will suffer the same fate.
sentences.chinese: 弹道导弹防御系统也会面临相同的命运。

sentences.english: This paper investigates autonomous navigation of a ballistic missile during the free-flight phase.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了弹道导弹在自由飞行阶段的自主导航问题。

sentences.english: The multiple kill vehicle(MKV) intercepting system being developed by USA is a new threat to the penetration capability of the ballistic missiles.
sentences.chinese: 美国的多杀伤器拦截系统是对弹道导弹突防的新威胁。

sentences.english: The tactical ballistic missile is one of targets that is the most difficult to be intercepted by air-defense system.
sentences.chinese: 战术弹道导弹是防空系统最难拦截的目标之一。

pinyin: zhou1 ji4 dan4 dao4 dao3 dan4

definition: anti-missile missile (such as the Patriot Missile)
to test-fire/to conduct a missile test
